entry.title: BeastlyGhost/Forever-Engine-Feather
entry.summary:
An open-source Friday Night Funkin' mod engine, based on Forever Engine Legacy.

Forever Engine Feather

An open-source, community driven Friday Night Funkin' mod engine, based on Forever Engine Legacy!

Forever Engine Feather is currently in a Work in Progress stage, maintained by the main developers and contributors.

FOREVER ENGINE FEATHER REQUIRES THE LATEST FLIXEL LIBRARIES TO BE INSTALLED.

I AM NOT RESPONSIBLE FOR CRASHES / ISSUES WITH OLDER VERSIONS OF FLIXEL, NOR I AM RESPONSIBLE FOR MAINTAINING SAID VERSIONS.

Features:

  • All of Forever Engine Legacy's Features;
  • A Scripting System based on HScript, SScript;
  • Reorganized source/ folder;
  • An Events System based on Hypno's Lullaby;
  • Fully Softcoded Game Weeks and Characters.

To see changes made to the engine, check out the CHANGELOG here.

If you want to push out improvements to Feather faster, take a look at the TODO list here.

For documentation like a guide for compiling, script variables and more, visit our repository's Wiki.

Need help? Want to give feedback?

Open an Issue on the Issues page or send me a Direct Message on my Discord, at BeastlyGhost#9035.
